message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique product. I believe you'll find it to be a valuable addition to your collection. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1,200,000.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I'm only willing to pay $1,300,000 at this time.  Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $1,400,000. This is a fair price considering the product's value to you.

Alice, I understand your perspective, but I'm still not quite there.  I'm willing to go up to $1,350,000.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product to me, and I believe it's a good deal for you as well. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.

I appreciate your flexibility, Bob. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $1,420,000. This is a reasonable price considering the product's value to you, and it's getting closer to my minimum price.
